Q.B. LAW

Quinon A. R. Brooker, a fierce criminal defense attorney with a commanding presence in the courtroom, a knack for winning difficult cases and a passion for fully satisfying his clients. Quinon is a graduate of Bethune-Cookman College (Daytona Beach, Florida) and the Thurgood Marshall School of Law at Texas Southern University (Houston, Texas). For the last 10 years, Quinon has focused his law practice on serious criminal defense trials and post-conviction remedies.

Texas Criminal Defense

The Law Office of Quinon Brooker defends many different demographics, but the majority of our clients tend to be young, black males. Download “The 7 Steps to Saving Black Boys From the Criminal Justice System” for what to do when your loved one is charged with a crime. We have successfully defended our clients in hundreds of criminal cases throughout the state of Texas. Once you have retained our offices, we will work diligently in your defense to obtain the best outcome available in your case.

Successful Track Record Against Unjust Charges

The Law Office of Attorney Quinon Brooker effectively represents people of all backgrounds in the most serious criminal cases in Texas. However, our most important work centers around criminal charges that appear to be racially motivated. We are the leading firm in Texas that understands the racial dynamics of criminal cases.
